text: Michael Chaves is an American film director, screenwriter, visual effects artist, editor and also, an executive producer. He is best known for his work on the miniseries, Chase Champions, and the theatrical films The Curse of La Llorona and The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It. == References == Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:American screenwriters Category:1984 births
title: Michael Chaves
